de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra

Class ProjectedCentroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra.Vector
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra.Centroid
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra.ProjectedCentroid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVector<Number>, NumberVector, SpatialComparable

    public class ProjectedCentroid
extends Centroid
    Centroid only using a subset of dimensions. This class abstracts the mathematics of efficient and numerically stable computation of projected centroids. See DatabaseUtil for easier to use APIs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.linearalgebra.Vector
